TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DnsPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class DnsPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 指定从域名服务器中请求信息的权限。

span.span: Specifies permission to request information from Domain Name Servers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过声明的安全信息特性目标，它是到类的元数据中存储应用。The security information declared by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which the is applied. 然后，系统将访问此信息在运行时。The system then accesses this information at run time. 传递给构造函数确定的允许的 DNS 目标。The that is passed to the constructor determines the allowable DNS targets. 这些安全属性仅用于[声明性安全](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8)。These security attributes are used only for [Declarative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8). 有关[命令性安全](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27)，使用相应类。For [Imperative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding class. 安全访问完全受限制，或者完全不受限制。Security access is either fully restricted or fully unrestricted. 设置属性`true`授予访问权限，或`false`为没有访问权限。Set the property to `true` to grant access, or `false` for no access. 将此属性设置为一个命名参数。Set this property as a named parameter. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用将声明性安全应用于自定义类。The following example uses to apply declarative security to a custom class. [!code-cpp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递给此构造函数的值指定允许目标。The value that is passed to this constructor specifies the allowable targets. ## Examples 下面的示例使用将声明性安全应用于自定义类。The following example uses to apply declarative security to a custom class. summary.span: 创建并返回 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.

returns.span: 与安全性声明相对应的 。

span.span: A that corresponds to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CreatePermission`由安全系统中，不是由应用程序代码调用方法。The `CreatePermission` method is called by the security system, not by application code. 所描述的安全信息特性目标，它是到类的元数据中存储应用。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 然后，系统访问在运行的时和调用信息。The system then accesses the information at run time and calls . 系统使用返回以强制执行指定的安全需求。The system uses the returned to enforce the specified security requirements.
